```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
df_1<-read_csv('final_dataframe copy.csv')
 df<- as.data.frame(sapply(df_1, as.numeric))
 head(df)
 
df<-rename(df,GNI="GNI per capita, Atlas method (current US$)")
df<-rename(df, PM2.5="Total Average PM2.5:" )
viz<-ggplot(df, aes(x=GNI,y= PM2.5))+geom_point()
print(viz)
df<-rename(df,Education ="School enrollment, primary (% net)")
df<-rename(df, Poverty="Poverty headcount ratio at national poverty line (% of population)")
viz_2<-ggplot(df, aes(x=Education,y= PM2.5))+geom_point()
print(viz_2)
viz_3<-ggplot(df, aes(x=Poverty,y= PM2.5))+geom_point()
print(viz_3)
df<-rename(df, 
           urban ="Urban population (% of total population)")
head(df)
viz_4<-ggplot(df, aes(x=urban,y= PM2.5))+geom_point()
print(viz_4)
coefficient <- cor.test(df$urban, df$PM2.5)
coefficient$estimate

```
